entity.name: Live: World Championship Snooker
entity.description: Live coverage from the World Snooker Championship from the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England.

entity.name: Day 1
entity.description: Sheffield's Crucible Theatre is hosting its 44th World Snooker Championship. Coverage from Judd Trump's opening session is followed by live first-round action with 2016 runner-up Ding Junhui taking on a qualifier.
